attributes.action: Daily Mail to apologise for supporting Fascism
attributes.additional_details:
Since the Daily Mail has become very interested in "family history" now would be a good time for it to publish - very clearly on its front page - a full and unreserved apology for its support for Hitler, the Nazis, the British Union of Fascists and for its campaigns against Jewish refugees from the Nazis and in favour of appeasing Hitler.

The editorial might like to reflect on which side they were on and which side Ralph Miliband was on and who most decent-minded people might presume "hated Britain".

The government should legislate to make the Daily Mail publish this front page headline.
